name: Spectral Nucleus
desc:
A complete energy core that can sometimes be found after defeating Specters.
There is a debate among those who just have to divide the world into winners and losers: what floats better — a Specter or an Anemo Slime?

customize.name: Pyro Specter
customize.desc:
A monster born from highly-concentrated Pyro elements that can float in the air.
There was once an Akademiya student who conducted research into their behavior. He believed that Specters were a form of Crystalfly; since they both had powers of flight and both were birthed in areas saturated with elemental energy. He has not graduated yet.

customize.name: Hydro Specter
customize.desc:
A monster birthed from a high concentration of Hydro that can float in the air.
On moonlit nights, Hydro Specters will give off a ghostly glow as they float by the riverbank. Their furtive forms are often mistaken by passers-by for wandering spirits, which has made them mainstays in quite a few folktales.

customize.name: Anemo Specter
customize.desc:
A monster birthed from a high concentration of Anemo that can float in the air.
As reason might dictate, monsters made from coalesced Anemo already come equipped with the ability to float. As such, their petal-like wings are most likely to be a mimetic organ first and foremost.

customize.name: Electro Specter
customize.desc:
A monster born from highly-concentrated Electro elements that can float in the air.
A certain researcher once studied these creatures. He believed that they must be Hypostases of some kind. After all, they both had elemental peculiarities and were birthed from areas saturated with elemental energy, right? By the way, he was later investigated for academic corruption.

customize.name: Dendro Specter
customize.desc:
A monster born from high-density Dendro energy that can float in the air.

A researcher from Vahumana once did research into the ecological peculiarities of Dendro Specters, finding them to be quite similar to the legendary "Aranara." His conclusion was that the Aranara were actually Dendro Specters. This researcher would become a little-known writer of fairy tales.

customize.name: Cryo Specter
customize.desc:
A monster born from highly-concentrated Cryo elements that can float in the air.
A certain alchemist once studied these beings, speculating that they might be a kind of Slime or the Traveler, as none of the above needed a Vision to use the elements. He was reprimanded by his teacher.

customize.name: Geo Specter
customize.desc:
A monster birthed from a high concentration of Geo that can float in the air.
Geo Specters mimic the fruit of certain plants when their wings are closed together. As such, they are held by some ancient tales to be the fruit of a giant tree in the sky, and are regarded as having mysterious medical value.

customize.name: Spectral Nucleus
customize.desc:
A complete energy core that can sometimes be found after defeating Specters.
There is a debate among those who just have to divide the world into winners and losers: what floats better — a Specter or an Anemo Slime?

customize.name: Masterless Starglitter
customize.desc:
Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
Surplus Starglitter of destiny. Perhaps it can light up other corners of the universe.

customize.name: Spectral Nucleus
customize.desc:
A complete energy core that can sometimes be found after defeating Specters.
There is a debate among those who just have to divide the world into winners and losers: what floats better — a Specter or an Anemo Slime?

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Spectral Heart
customize.desc:
An energy core that allows the Specters to float.
These elemental life-forms have strange behavioral patterns and will periodically surge in number before disappearing.

customize.name: Chiori
customize.desc: The owner of Chioriya Boutique. A tailor renowned throughout Fontaine.

customize.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
customize.desc: The Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island. All of the island's affairs are at this young lady's fingertips.

customize.name: Aloy
customize.desc: Formerly an outcast, now a hunter of unparalleled skill. Ready to do the right thing at any time.

customize.name: Kirara
customize.desc: A courier for Komaniya Express, a delivery company in Inazuma. A nekomata who loves her job and human society.

customize.name: Kuki Shinobu
customize.desc: The capable and reliable deputy leader of the "Arataki Gang." Please note: capable and reliable are not appellations for the "Arataki Gang," but for their deputy leader in specific.

customize.name: Gorou
customize.desc: The great general of Watatsumi Island's forces. He is deeply trusted by his subordinates.

customize.name: Aqua Simulacra
customize.desc: This longbow's color is unpredictable. Under the light, it takes on a lustrous, watery blue.

customize.name: Polar Star
customize.desc: A pristine bow that is as sharp as the glaciers of the far north.

customize.name: Mouun's Moon
customize.desc: A lovely warbow made from seashells and coral. A mournful brilliance flows along its moonlight-colored arms.

customize.name: Sunny Morning Sleep-In
customize.desc: A bell lantern forged from purple jade. They say it brings sweet dreams when placed beside one's pillow.

customize.name: Kagura's Verity
customize.desc: The bells used when performing the Kagura Dance, blessed by the Guuji herself. The scent of the Sacred Sakura tree lingers on it.

customize.name: Everlasting Moonglow
customize.desc: A string of lovely jasper from the deep sea. It shines with a pure radiance like that of the moon, and just as ever-distant.

customize.name: Oathsworn Eye
customize.desc: A national treasure of Byakuyakoku stored in the Dainichi Mikoshi. With the coming of the Serpent God, this item was used to notarize great oaths and wishes.

customize.name: Dialogues of the Desert Sages
customize.desc: A caduceus symbolizing the glory of alchemy, made from special alloys to match its special status. It is exceedingly rigid and heavy, and would probably hurt pretty bad if used as a cudgel.

customize.name: "The Catch"
customize.desc: In the distant past, this was the beloved spear of a famed Inazuman bandit.

customize.name: Mailed Flower
customize.desc: A graceful and elegant greatsword that is decorated with flowers and ribbons.

customize.name: Kagotsurube Isshin
customize.desc: This famed blade was born in a nation to the far north. But in the name of "Isshin," it was stained with many a dark deed on its home-bound journey.

customize.name: Spectral Husk
customize.desc:
An energy core that allows the Specters to float. It contains a small amount of elemental energy.
Most of the rest has already dispersed.

customize.name: Spectral Heart
customize.desc:
An energy core that allows the Specters to float.
These elemental life-forms have strange behavioral patterns and will periodically surge in number before disappearing.
